title: Au cœur du collège, un an à Jean Vilar
overview: This documentary series aims to reveal and understand education, its challenges, its hopes, its successes, and sometimes its limits. At an age when everything is possible - at this turning point in life - this unique program offers an uncompromising, but empathetic, look at life in a REP (Priority Education Network) middle school. Students and teachers alike will talk about the difficulties as well as the successes encountered throughout this school year.
